title: Paul Rennie to Speak on Modern British Posters at Central St Martins
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828101009/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 28.Apr.2008 6.14pm 

Modern British Posters  
======================

Paul Rennie will be giving a talk on this theme at Central St Martins  
College of Art and Design on Tuesday 6 May, 6.30pm.

There will be a chance to view the exhibition of the same name from 6pm  
in the Lethaby Gallery. Tickets, including drinks, cost £5 (£3  
concessions) and numbers are limited so please RSVP to the St Bride  
Foundation if you would like to attend:

info [at] stbridefoundation [dot] org / 020 7353 3331

Money from ticket sales goes directly to St Bride Library.

The exhibition is open until 17 May and opening hours are Monday-Friday  
10.00am - 6.00pm and Saturday 10.00am to 4.00pm.

More information:  
 [http://www.csm.arts.ac.uk/43010.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828101009/http:/www.csm.arts.ac.uk/43010.htm "http://www.csm.arts.ac.uk/43010.htm")
